pageContext.claim: “There was a rumor being spread that I didn't want football back, and it was just the opposite. That was another disinformation rumor put out by the Biden campaign. And it was just the opposite.”
pageContext.analysis: It wasn't a rumor. Joe Biden's campaign ran a TV ad showing empty stadiums and churches, with a narrator saying, “Trump put America on the sidelines. Let’s get back in the game.” Biden would argue that Trump's mismanagement of the pandemic caused sports leagues to cancel games and seasons, not that Trump wanted these events canceled.
